item.title: Report X-2024080547
item.description:
Report X-2024080547

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-12T15:14:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-06
  • City: SPARTANBURG
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Class 3-labelled hazmat package 277784913253 (not shipped under hazmat service code) returned to shipper due to missing hazmat certification paperwork was repacked by the shipper perpendicular to the orientation arrows inside another box without any hazmat marks or labels. Cans found having leaked during sorting with dents in the bottom.

item.title: Report X-2024080291
item.description:
Report X-2024080291

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-12T15:14:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-25
  • City: GREER
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During sort operations at the GSPR location a fiberboard box was discovered open and contained a metal cylinder with a flammable DG mark. The outer fiberboard box did not have any DG marking or paperwork required for transport. The shipment is being held at the location.
